page_not_found_description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
search_through_cats: Search through several cats that are up for adoption
enter_your_email_to_reset: Enter email address to receive password reset link
preferences_desc: Define preferences for the type of cat you seek
discovery_desc: Look at several cats that fit your criteria
cat_card_desc: Look at the cat's profile to learn more about the cat
swipe_desc: Swipe right or heart a cat to chat with it's owner. Swipe left or reject a cat to see others
chat_desc: If the cat is right for you, arrange with the owner to take home your new furry friend!
profile_desc: Create a new profile for the cat you are finding a new home for
cat_details_desc: Add a description about the cat and any key details to it's profile
interest_desc: People will see the cat's profile and swipe right or heart it if they are interested
swipe_creates_chat_desc: A swipe right or heart will create a new chat between you and the interested party
chats_notifications_desc: Review your notifications and chats to stay updated on potential adopters
rehome_desc: Once you've found the right adopter, arrange for the cat to be taken to their new home!
password_minimum: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_maximum: Password must be at most 64 characters
password_format: Password must have at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 digit
